attributes.action: Please do something to tackle ridiculous house prices - British people want homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No place like home? How should I know? I'm never going to have one!

The property boom has destroyed many young British lives and taken away their futures! It's time for action!

In a nation where it is increasingly common to see bricks & mortar as property for investors rather than homes for people, how has it gone so drastically wrong?

Many people are now resigned to a lifetime of renting as in total disbelief we watch prices go higher and higher still. Renting is all well and good but it should be a temporary 
measure for young adults starting out, not something they're forced into permanently.

What would happen for example if they wanted a pet dog, shock horror, not many landlords will allow that! In which case, a rental property cannot be considered adequate as a home for hardworking young people. Those of us who contribute to society should surely have some chance for a modest abode of our own, where we can live to our own rules.

A mentality of greed and self-satisfaction has taken over much of our country like never before which is so sad! 'I own all this, I only paid this and now it's worth this...! WOWEEEE!' Why should they care that it stops so many from ever having the chance of a home?
